sprint_goal: Establish the service foundation, database schema, and a fully automated CI/CD pipeline to AWS EKS.
Implement the complete user registration flow for customers, vendors, and riders, including security features like account lockout.
Deliver the complete OTP login and session management flow, and enable customers to manage their profiles and addresses.
Build out the core administrator capabilities, including user management, system configuration, and a complete, immutable audit trail.
Implement critical compliance features for DPDP Act (consent, erasure) and enable full service observability with logging, metrics, and tracing.
